data.Title: Google Keeps Third-Party Cookies in Chrome
data.Description: After years of uncertainty and industry pushback, Google has decided to retain third-party cookies in its Chrome browser, reversing its earlier stance on phasing them out.

data.Title: Google's AI Overviews Get New Features
data.Description: Google is testing several new features for its AI Overviews in search, including saving overviews, displaying link icons for sources, and generating video descriptions.

data.Title: Bing Tests Related Searches at the Top
data.Description: Bing is experimenting with the placement of related searches, moving them to the top of the search results page, directly under the search bar.

data.Title: Google Search Tests Larger Sitenames and Favicons
data.Description: Google is running experiments with the display of website names and favicons in search results, making them appear larger in some instances.

data.Title: Google Ads Editor 2.7 Released
data.Description: Google has launched version 2.7 of its Google Ads Editor, introducing a range of updates and changes to the platform.

data.Title: Google Provides Tips for SEO and Content Growth
data.Description: Google offers guidance on improving SEO through internal linking and cautions websites about the potential impact of rapid content growth on search rankings.
